content.text: Trial 2/5, Stage 'ytraverse2': Please describe the image and compute the stiffness matrix.

The groove orientation is along the X-axis (horizontal in the image). The groove coordinate system is defined as follows: X is along the groove, Y and Z are perpendicular.

### Stiffness Matrix
```json
{
  "stiffness_matrix": [
    [250, 0, 0],
    [0, 100, 0],
    [0, 0, 100]
  ]
}
```
